title: Additional revenue with additional labor is MRPL

content.question: The marginal revenue product of labor is the

choices.label: product price times the wage rate
additional revenue a firm earns when it employs an additional unit of labor
increase in the average product of labor when the firm employs an additional unit of labor
increase in the price of labor when the firm employs an additional unit of labor

content.answer: additional revenue a firm earns when it employs an additional unit of labor

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
